name: Greenspire
description:
In "Greenspire," you play as a fairy tasked with protecting the forest from the encroaching city. Humans are building structures beneath the forest's towering trees, threatening the natural world. As the guardian of the forest, it's your job to green these artificial structures and preserve the beauty and harmony of the forest. You'll explore the forest, meet its inhabitants, and use your magic to turn the city's structures into thriving green spaces. However, as you progress through the game, you'll also be faced with the consequences of human development and must decide how to best protect the forest and its inhabitants. Join the fight for nature in "Greenspire" and experience the magical world of the forest as you transform the city into a greener place.

Tomoya Miwata - Game Developer / Team Lead

Taylor Pargeter - Level Designer

Bure Stalmarck - Composer

in GGJ2023 at Humber College
